description: Savills pleased to present this amaising four-bedroom duplex penthouse located in 52 | 42 Tower 1 ,Features: ,- 4 bedroom+maids Duplex Penthouse,- Large Terrace,- Fully Furnished, luxury upgrades ,- High Floor,- Size: 3695sqft,- Currently tenanted at 1.3 mil,- Full Sea and Blue Waters Island Views,5242 Towers is a two-tower residential complex in Dubai Marina. Developed by Emaar Properties, the 52|42 complex has a western tower with 52 floors and an eastern tower with 42 floors. Both buildings are joined by a 5-storey podium which houses an infinity pool, gardens and retail outlets. Interested buyers and tenants will find 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartment types in Fifty Two Forty Two. ,The nautical theme complex also features a variety of amenities such as private decks, infinity pools, gardens and club facilities. The residential complex is located close to Blue Waters Island Street and King Salman Bin Abdul Aziz Al Saud Street. ,With its stunning skyline, Dubai Marina has become one of the most sought-after residential destinations in the city. The neighbourhood has many residential towers, hotels, restaurants and entertainment venues offering various dining, shopping and leisure activities. description: About KG Tower, Dubai Marina,KG Tower is a residential building in Dubai Marina consisting of 20 floors. This freehold project was launched by KG International FZCO in 2005 and the architectural contract was given to Atkins Dimensional Engineering Consultant. The building facade features a colour palette of off-white and blue. Its irregular shape stands out from the other towers in the area with its ship-like balconies protruding out from the flats. ,KG Tower, Dubai Marina has 68 flats ranging from 2 to 4-bedroom units. The units are spacious with featuring servants rooms, dressing rooms and multiple balconies. ,The tower overlooks Dubai Marina, offering a spectacular view of maritime activities. The neighbourhood is one of the most popular residential areas on the city. It is close to major shopping hubs and business centres in Dubai, making it convenient for residents to commute to other key areas in the city. ,Facilities in KG Tower, Dubai Marina,PARKING,The underground parking in KG Tower, Dubai allows residents to park their cars inside the building. As for visitors, they can park their cars on empty streets outside the tower. ,ELEVATORS,There are three high speed elevators in KG Tower, Dubai Marina for passengers, as well as a separate service elevator to move furniture and other heavy objects in the building. ,SECURITY, CENTRAL AIR-CONDITIONING AND MAINTENANCE SERVICES ,KG Tower, Dubai Marina is monitored round the clock through CCTV cameras. The security staff plays an active role in guarding the building premises. For utilities supplies, DEWA takes care of electricity and water. ,EVENT SPACE,The tower contains a BBQ area for hosting parties and events. ,GYM AND FITNESS FACILITIES ,There are several fitness amenities for residents. These include a swimming pool along with jacuzzi, sauna and steam rooms. The shared gym allows active lifestyle for people living in the building. ,Residents can also find many gyms in Dubai Marina where they can carry out their fitness routine including TribeFit, Iconic and NRG. ,LIFESTYLE AMENITIES,The play area in KG Tower, Dubai Marina allows children to enjoy their leisure time. ,CONCIERGE AND GUEST SERVICES ,KG Tower, Dubai Marina have round the clock concierge services for the comfort and convenience of its residents.

The property's strategic location ensures privacy and uninterrupted leisure in your own backyard. ,This villa is an exceptional opportunity to experience upscale living in one of Dubai's most sought-after neighbourhoods. It's more than just a home; it's a haven of peace and luxury waiting for you to make it your own.

description: BEYOND. is delighted for sale a two-bedroom apartment in the Seapoint complex, with an area of 108 sq. m. , with direct views of the Palm Jumeirah, in one of the prestigious areas of Dubai - Beachfront (Dubai Harbour). A premium residential complex from the famous developer EMAAR, which is a complex of two towers 42 and 57 floors high. ,Residences at Seapoint feature floor-to-ceiling glazing to maximize views of the Palm Jumeirah skyline, Bluewaters Island and Ain Dubai. ,This is the first long-awaited project on the Beachfront with a private, enclosed beach stretching over 450 meters. Among the infrastructure that will be available to residents is a private beach, a spacious infinity pool, a children's play area with swimming pools, landscaped gardens, barbecue gazebos and roof gardens. ,The functional layout of the apartment includes: a living area combined with a dining zone and kitchen, a master bedroom with a dressing room and a bathroom, and a children's room with a bathroom. The living room and master bedroom have their own view balconies. ,The project has high investment potential. ,Completion of construction is scheduled for the second quarter of 2028. ,Beachfront is a new prestigious premium residential area, which is being built by EMAAR on a man-made island as part of the development of the Dubai Harbor territory, which will become another point of attraction on the map of Dubai, located between Palm Jumeirah and Dubai Marina. The quarter consists of 27 high-rise residential buildings, some of which will be occupied by hotels and branded apartments Address Hotels + Resorts, equipped beaches with a total length of more than 1.5 kilometers, a yacht marina for 1,400 boats with a club house and restaurants. ,The Beachfront location makes it one of the most desirable places to live in Dubai. It is located close to all the infrastructure necessary for comfortable living, including the best schools and universities. In addition, the area has excellent transport accessibility.
